name: Acid - Green Candela - Krush
additionalNotes: Popular for its petite size and green color, this cigarillo is also known for its unique flavor profile. It offers a great floral and aromatic smoke with sugar and tea notes. This mild mini-cigar is wrapped in a gorgeous green Candela wrapper and is infused with botanicals, herbs, and oils that provide a fresh and mild smoking experience. This amazing Drew Estate Acid Krush Green Candella Cigarillo comes in a beautiful tin pack of 10.
